title: The Alliance in Peril
description: Jake's continuing adventures take him into even more incidents and situations along the way. The alliance continued to face ongoing dangers and thought their advanced weapons would save them from the Silka; they were wrong! There are many occupied alliance worlds; not one could be considered a safe refuge. Not only that, the Silka fleet outnumbers the alliance and with skirmishes on the increase, is there going to be an all-out invasion?
author: Peter Lewis Atkinson
